original_title: Jerry Nelson: A Celebratory Birthday Animatic
overview: 'Today (July 10) is Jerry Nelson's birthday! To celebrate, artist Zach Kenny has taken an incredible audio tape from 1999 of over three dozen Muppets wishing him a happy birthday, and created an animatic so we can all see it too!' - ToughPigs on Twitter
title: Jerry Nelson: A Celebratory Birthday Animatic
